= Usage =

Linux:
  * `bin/rf_ace --help`
  * `bin/rf_ace -I input_matrix.tsv -i 0 -n 100 -m 100 -O output_asociations.tsv` 
  * `bin/rf_ace -I input_matrix.tsv -i 0 -n 100 -m 100 -s 10 -p 21 -O output_asociations.tsv`
